title: Padre Island National Seashore: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News              What's the Best Way to Stay Connected? Padre Island National Seashore has two Facebook pages for you to stay connected to what is happening in the park.    Click here for Padre Island National Seashore's main Facebook page. http://www.facebook.com/nps.pais Click here for Division of Sea Turtle Science & Recovery's Facebook page. http://www.facebook.com/nps.pais.seaturtles
